casebody.data:
Edith May Ashburn, appellant, v. F. W. Woolworth Company, appellee.Gen. No. 39,857.

Hall, J., dissenting.

Opinion filed June 29, 1938.Charles C. Spencer, C. C. Ownbey and Arthur L. Balias, for appellant; Richard M. Spencer, of counsel. Kirkland, Fleming, Green, Martin & Ellis, for appellee; William H. Symmes, David Jaeker and John M. O'Connor, Jr., of counsel. Mr. Presiding Justice Hebei

delivered the opinion of the court.
